title: Ha-Borer
overview: The story of Baroch Asulin (Moshe Ivgi); the Head of a Crime family that's being used as a "Borer" - a crime sorter in the underworld, a person who criminals go to to help sort out their differences and also the story of Nadav Feldman (Yehuda Levi), A goodie goodie social worker who finds out he is the son of the Borer. Information which takes him out of his quiet life & throws him into a world of crime.
